attributes.action: grant the application of Tal Bahadur Pun VC for immigration to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tal Bahadur Pun was awarded the Victoria Cross for his actions during World War 2.  This petition is raised with the intention of overturning the ludicrous ruling that Tal Bahadur Pun VC has failed to demonstrate strong ties with Britain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
